data.text: @SBParanjape @sthalekar93 @abcnews @LJFamFoundation @thechappellfndn Absolutely. The money helps fund those other solutions such as those provided by @BackTrackYouth

@TraceyLeeHolmes @sthalekar93 @abcnews @LJFamFoundation @thechappellfndn Having done this successfully, the key question now is “how to solve the problem” (of homelessness). Perhaps money alone cannot solve it; non-monetary solutions also need to be considered.
